SEARCH
Module sc2002OOP
Package sc2002OOP.obj.internshipopportunity

Interface IOpportunity

All Known Implementing Classes:
InternshipOpportunity
public interface IOpportunity

Internship Opportunity Contract Interface

This interface defines the complete mandatory contract for an InternshipOpportunity entity. It ensures all opportunity objects possess the core attributes, administrative flags, date information, and utility methods required for management and student viewing.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kee Kai Wen, Kelvin Tay Wei Jie, Koay Jun Zhi, Lim Jia Wei Jerald, Teo Kai Jie
See Also:
  • InternshipOpportunity
  • InternshipOpportunityStatus

      boolean isVisibility()
      Checks if the opportunity is currently visible to students.
      Returns:
      true if visible, false otherwise.
